Uses of Package
com.example.instantcab

  • Classes in com.example.instantcab used by com.example.instantcab 
    Class and Description
    BaseDialog
    This base dialog box for build click listener for ok and cancel choices
    BaseDialog.OKClickListener 
    BaseDialog.OnCancelClickListener 
    EnterRouteActivity
    This activity allows riders to select start and end location by tapping on the map and click on start or destination button to set start or destination Default start location is current location Riders can also type and search destination
    LogActivity
    This activity logs in the user based on email and password and then takes them to the Driver/Rider home page depending on their user type In the future the password will be auto hidden while typing
    MainActivity
    This class takes the user to the signUp or Login activity based on a button click
    OKCancelDialog.OKClickListener 
    OKCancelDialog.OnCancelClickListener 
    PaymentActivity
    This class is an activity used for the rider to tip the driver and also calculate the total amount of money the rider needs to pay.
    PayQRAct
    This activity generates and displays a QR code based on a string combined with the agreed upon fare with the added tip.
    PreviewRequestActivity
    This activity has a map that shows the driving route between start location and destination Shows estimated fare When user clicks the send request button, send the request in database and jump to open request page Also show the address of destination over the map, when rider clicks on it, jump to EnterRouteActivity to change the request
    Request
    Request object to store information of a request and is used in firebase
    RiderRequest
    This class provides an activity to show a request page to the rider and allow the rider to confirm or cancel the trip.
    SignUpAct
    In future updates the SignUp activity will be accompanied by a necessary Check and Flag function This function will check for a min 6 digit password, a proper email with @ sign, and a properly formatted phone number.
